channel.title: Firewatch on Schafe sind bessere Rasenmäher
channel.description: Recent content in Firewatch on Schafe sind bessere Rasenmäher

item.title: Weekly wrap-up - April 04
item.description:
Here’s what I’ve been up to this last week.

Gaming

After a long drought without gaming (the little one kept going to bed well after 21:30), I finally found the time for a few hours of gaming with only minor interruptions.

I decided to finally take the plunge and play Firewatch. Reviews were very positive when the game came out, but I had originally put it on the never, ever pile after not getting to it for 8 years.
